'''Felix Jones''', also known as '''Xilefian''' ({{Audio|XilefianPronunciation.mp3|/ˈzaɪlɛˌfiːən/|link2=''ZY-leh-FEE-ən''}}<ref name=":0">{{tweet|Xilefian|1370783984947445767|Someone stick this on my Minecraft wiki page please.<br><br>Xilefian /ˈzaɪleˌfiːən/<br>http://ipa-reader.xyz/?text=%CB%88za%C9%AAle%CB%8Cfi%CB%90%C9%99n&voice=Brian|March 13, 2021}}</ref>; derived from his first name backwards), is a ''Minecraft'' Technical Lead<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref> at [[Mojang Studios|Mojang Studios]] and the tech lead for Minecraft {{BE}} gameplay. He joined the ''Minecraft'' team in January 2020.<ref name=":1">{{tweet|Xilefian|1202640572399394817|This January I'm joining Mojang and the Minecraft team as a Java Game Developer!<br><br>I remember the first day I played Minecraft in Alpha and now - all these years later - I have the chance to contribute back to a landmark title that changed the world.<br><br>Will Tweet more!<br><br>#Minecraft|December 5, 2019}}</ref>

==Trivia==
*Xilefian has been playing ''Minecraft'' since [[Java Edition Alpha|alpha]].<ref name=":1" />
*Xilefian had a fun moment while deciding how to do the eyes on his ''Minecraft'' player [[skin]].<ref>{{tweet|Xilefian|1475816459330899968|I spent about 45 minutes laughing maniacally after deciding how to do the eyes on my Minecraft skin.<br><br>Reject conformity; embrace chaos.<br><br>You can put that on my Minecraft wiki page|December 28, 2021}}</ref>
*His skin makes a cameo in the video [[Minecraft Celebrates the Community! (Yes, that means you!)|Minecraft Celebrates the Community]], being blown up by a [[creeper]].<ref>{{Reddit2|sub=Minecraft|cid=hp33rqv|text=Everyone forgets Minecraft developer u/xilefian|author=xilefian|date=December 18, 2021|id=rj7yiv}}</ref>
